channeldata.description: The thermotools package is a lowlevel implementation toolbox for the analyis of multi-ensemble calculations. It contains estimators for the state-continuous transition-based reweighting analysis method (TRAM) and its state-discrete variant (dTRAM), Bennet acceptance ratio (BAR) and its multi-state variant (MBAR), and the weighted histogram analysis method (WHAM). While you can use thermotools on its own, we recommend to use it in combination with PyEMMA.
channeldata.summary: Lowlevel implementation of (transition-based and histogram) reweighting analyis methods for Python.
